properties.name: Joie de Vivre
properties.description: Posted by Bernard19 L\'Age, 23800 La Celle DunoiseCome and unwind in one of the most picturesque and unspoilt areas of France, in a beautiful, restored 19th century farmhouse situated in the Creuse area (23) in Mid-West France. We offer you luxurious Bed & Breakfast accommodation, the highest standard of personal service, excellent cuisine and the all-important warm welcome to ensure you enjoy a perfect B&B break.

properties.name: Petite Ecosse
properties.description: Posted by Bernard1Champagnac, 87320 Bussiere PoitevineAt La Petite Ecosse we offer both fishing holidays with accommodation and gite holidays. If you are looking for a fishing holiday in which you could catch serious fish and combine it with a family holiday in first class self catering accommodation, in beautiful surroundings, OR, If you are looking for a restful, peaceful holiday away from the hustle and bustle in beautiful surroundings - Then you have come to the right place.
